title: Strictly Ballroom Barry Fife (Bill Hunter) costume
credit_line: Lent by the Museum of Applied Arts and Sciences, Sydney. Gift of M&A Film Corporation Pty Ltd, 1993.
brief_description: In Baz Luhrmann’s Strictly Ballroom (1992), sparkles are a must. Despite Barry Fife’s (Bill Hunter) limited time on the dance floor, his sequined tuxedo shimmers and shines and helps bring the film to life.
